text: Is there any wrapper available like keras for deep learning?

elements.text: Is there any wrapper available like keras for deep learning?

text:
Keras.jl but you can also consider:
<https://twitter.com/aureliengeron/status/1277751121440698368>

attachments.fallback: <https://twitter.com/aureliengeron|@aureliengeron>: This is 100% #JuliaLang code. It trains a dense neural network using the #Keras Python library. If you replace the first 3 lines with "import tensorflow as tf; from tensorflow import keras", you can run the exact same code in Python. Talk about excellent interoperability! :handshake: <https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Ebt2U7YVAAAqPSz.png>
attachments.text: This is 100% #JuliaLang code. It trains a dense neural network using the #Keras Python library.
